Node.definition: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria
literally: hand; hence: = pertaining to the location to the left or right of an object ◄ analogous to the location of someone's hands or arms

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
= town or village; ◄ at northern boundary of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= location, also known as Hazar Enon (חֲצַר עֵינֹון) ◄ north east of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
= town; ◄ in Syria (אֲרָם) ► capital of one of the Aramaean (אֲרָם) kingdoms
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria
literally: hand; hence: = pertaining to the location to the left or right of an object ◄ analogous to the location of someone's hands or arms
= town, area; ◄ on Orontes river in Syria (אֲרָם) ► capital of Aramean (אֲרַמִּי) kingdom; its inhabitants were relocated to Samaria (שֹׁמְרֹון) by the king of Assyria (אַשּׁוּר)
literally: the sea; = a cardinal direction pointing towards the west, ◄ which, in Israel, is the direction towards the Mediterranean Sea
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fifth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Bilhah (בִּלְהָה) slave of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of a tribe
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

= man; ◄ son of Ahitub (אֲחִיטוּב) descendent of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► father of Ahimaaz (אֲחִימַעַץ) became high priest (כֹּהֵן) under David (דָּוִד) and Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) with the prophet (נָבִיא) Nathan (נָתָן) anointed Solomon as David (דָּוִד)'s successor; officer in charge of his tribe

= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties

Node.gloss: to work|to till|to plow (soil, flax)|to dress (a vineyard)
Node.definition: literally, to serve; therefore = action by which workers prepare land of planting and harvesting; also refers to caring for a vineyard, processing linen, or using cattle for working the land

= one of the sides or corners of an object
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= one of the sides or corners of an object
literally: the sea; = a cardinal direction pointing towards the west, ◄ which, in Israel, is the direction towards the Mediterranean Sea
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ seventh son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Zilpah (זִלְפָּה) slave of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ seventh son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Zilpah (זִלְפָּה) slave of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= one of the sides or corners of an object
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the right of a person facing the direction of the rising sun, ◄ which is the direction of the Negev desert
= area located to the south of a point of reference
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
= town; ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

= town, also known as En Mishpat (עֵין מִשְׁפָּט) , Kedesh (קֶדֶשׁ) and Kadesh Barnea (קָדֵשׁ בַּרְנֵעַ) ◄ located in the Wilderness of Zin (צִן) in the northern part of Sinai (סִינַי) peninsula; ► Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) encamped there on their way from Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) to Canaan (כְּנַעַן) it is also the location of the Meribah (מְרִיבָה) spring; spies were sent out into Canaan from this place; it later marked the southern border of the territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
literally: the sea; hence: = a large body of salt water located between Europe and Africa, west of Canaan/Israel
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to cause (something) to fall (to someone); hence: = causative process by which humans or deities cause land to become someone else's property
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= a group of people within a larger group, placed together for a particular task or duty
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= a place through which one can leave a building or town

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= one of the sides or corners of an object
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria
= state in which a countable entity is five in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
